'''Fontaine Fashion Week''' is an event in [[Fontaine]].

==Overview==
Fontaine Fashion Week is a large, recurring social event which [[Chiori]] is not particularly fond of.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Where the Roses Bloom (Quest)}}</ref> One will occur sometime after the events of ''[[Roses and Muskets]]''.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Two Musketeers' Triumph (Quest)}}</ref>

==Trivia==
* This event name likely refers to the real-world {{w|Paris Fashion Week}}. Although the first events dubbed "{{w|Fashion Week}}" were held in New York in 1943, the concept of seasonal fashion shows first appeared in Paris during the 19th century.
